Noise Models (martini.noise)¶

class martini.noise.GaussianNoise(rms=<Quantity 1. Jy>)[source]¶

Implementation of a simple Gaussian noise model.

Provides a generate method producing a cube of Gaussian noise.

Parameters:
rms : Quantity, with dimensions of flux density (e.g. Jy)

Root mean square amplitude of the noise field.
generate(self, datacube)[source]¶

Create a cube containing Gaussian noise.

Some numpy functions such as np.random.normal strip units, so need to handle them explicitly.

Parameters:
datacube : martini.DataCube instance

This method will be called passing the martini.DataCube instance as an argument; its attributes can thus be accessed here. datacube._array.shape is particularly relevant.
Returns:
out : Quantity, with dimensions of flux density

Noise realization with size matching the DataCube._array.
